block.p: GERST-Evelyn. On October 14, 2000 at the age of 88. Beloved wife of the late Dr. George. Devoted mother of Judith Gerst Silverstein and Stephanie Douglas Furman. Cherished grandmother of George, Alfred and Jane Silverstein, and William Douglas and Lyn Douglas Vera and greatgrandmother of Leah, Sarah, Julia and Steven Douglas. Dear sister of Tillie Rosen Greenwald. Service Tuesday, 10:00 AM at ''Riverside Memorial Chapel'', 21 West Broad Street, Mount Vernon, NY.
